about_the_game:
Note: The description is not finished and will be edited in the process of development. This also applies to the list of localisations.

A Non-linear Visual Novel with Point & Click elements. Visit 10 main (and ??? secret ) locations, complete tasks and choose your path. Don't forget to keep an eye on your stress level, otherwise you might say something wrong.


The second half of the XX century. The Kami Order, a religious organization with unknown motives, is gaining popularity in many countries. At the same time, rumours about revival of disastrous state experiment are circulating around. You are Subject Number 0 (referred as S-0) and you have been forced to participate in this study. Whether to follow the authors' script or try to break out of it is only up to you. Or perhaps you'd risk to get to the bottom of it?


- The Kami Space is a terrifying and cruel place where losing your mind is especially easy. Keep an eye on your stress level and recover using cigarettes, alcohol or... hugs?
- It's hard to say anything sensible when your hands are shaking, isn't it? As your stress level rises, you are more likely to choose the wrong answer. Watch out, as it can play a bad joke at a crucial moment.
- Protagonist's worldview changes due to the stress level. This can open new dialogue options, quests, or even locations.
- Each task can be completed in 2-3 ways.
- The game has two main endings (and ??? secret ones), which depend on... a lot of things.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains murder scenes, images of blood and corpses.
Alcohol and cigarette consumption, also depression and insanity are demonstrated.

short_description: The parade of senses begins and you are forced to become its participant. So make the most of the situation! Explore the Kami Space, help to other forced, who have been trapped here, look for answers to questions, betray, kill... or spare and protect.
